TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TemplateGroupCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class TemplateGroupCollection Implements IList
public ref class TemplateGroupCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList

summary.span: 表示控件设计器中 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类和任何派生的类，定义属性作为对象。The class, and any derived class, defines the property as a object. 属性通常仅由设计宿主如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The property is typically used only by a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 添加对象时，集合动态增加的大小。The collection dynamically increases in size as objects are added. 在此集合中的索引是从零开始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 使用属性来确定在集合中的组数。Use the property to determine how many groups are in the collection. 此外，使用方法和属性，以提供以下功能：Additionally, use the methods and properties to provide the following functionality: - 方法将单个组添加到集合。The method to add a single group to the collection. - 方法在集合中的特定索引处添加组。The method to add a group at a particular index within the collection. - 方法删除组。The method to remove a group. - 方法移除特定索引处的组。The method to remove the group at a particular index. - 方法来确定特定组是否已在集合中。The method to determine whether a particular group is already in the collection. - 方法来检索集合中的组的索引。The method to retrieve the index of a group within the collection. - 索引器以获取或设置组中使用数组表示法的特定索引处。The indexer to get or set the group at a particular index, using array notation. - 方法将多个组添加到集合。The method to add multiple groups to the collection. 可以将多个组添加作为数组的组或作为检索到的对象的另一个控件设计器的属性。You can add multiple groups either as an array of groups or as a object that you retrieve through the property of another control designer. - 方法从集合中移除所有组。The method to remove all groups from the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何定义一个派生自的简单控件设计器类。The following code example demonstrates how to define a simple control designer that is derived from the class. 派生的控件设计器实现通过基类获取定义的模板组并添加了特定于派生的控件设计器的模板组的属性。The derived control designer implements the property by getting the template groups that are defined for the base class and adding a template group that is specific to the derived control designer. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection/CS/templategroupcollectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection/VB/templategroupcollectionsample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数来创建一个空集合。Use the constructor to create an empty collection. 你可以将元素添加到集合中使用， ，或方法。You can add elements to the collection by using the , , or method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过使用来确定相等性方法对象。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects. 方法执行线性搜索; 因此，平均执行时间成比例属性。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 因为模板组集合通常很小，线性搜索操作的性能并不重要。Because template group collections typically are small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常用于确定上限索引，当循环访问集合中的对象。The property generally is used to determine the upper boundary index when iterating through objects in the collection. 集合索引是从零开始的因为第一个元素是在索引`0`和最后一个元素是在索引`Count-1`。Because the collection indexes are zero-based, the first element is at index `0` and the last element is at index `Count-1`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用索引器以检索在指定组`index`集合中，或若要设置在指定的组`index`集合中。Use the indexer to retrieve the group at a specified `index` within the collection or to set the group at a specified `index` within the collection. 可以通过使用数组表示法索引集合中的元素。You can index elements in the collection by using array notation. 例如，你可以编制索引处的元素索引`i`使用记数法`TemplateGroups(i)`为 Microsoft visual Basic 或`TemplateGroups[i]`对于 C#。For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `TemplateGroups(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `TemplateGroups[i]` for C#. 当您具有对组对象的引用，并且需要在集合中对象的索引时，使用方法。When you have a reference to the group object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除的第一个匹配项`group`从集合。The method removes the first occurrence of `group` from the collection. 如果对象不包含`group`，集合保持不变。If the object does not contain `group`, the collection remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. 方法通过使用来确定相等性方法对象。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects. 方法执行线性搜索; 因此，平均执行时间成比例属性。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 因为模板组集合通常很小，线性搜索操作的性能并不重要。Because template group collections typically are small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical. 若要从集合中删除位于特定索引处的组，使用方法。To remove a group at a particular index from the collection, use the method. 若要从集合中移除所有组，使用方法。To remove all the groups from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 当从集合中移除项时，集合中的后续项的索引将更改。When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
